title: Need help for those who care
body:
Hello everyone , i hope you start your year off well , because i didn't. 
Here's the story , In christmas i got a little bit of money and decided to buy some RP , just to find out that in my country (Tunisia) we don't have a way to buy RP since our credit cards are national and don't work in websites , so i did some research and found a guy who claimed to be able to provide what i needed so i did , i sent him money and met with him and opened my account on sight and he delivered and bought me 7.5Euros worth of RP , i was happy with them.The next day i woke up to my account banned , so i contacted the support explaining my problem and they replied today telling me that you have to assume responsability on all 3rd party purchases and they told me that there was a chargeback and you and you were suspended until you pay back the negative charges. It appeared that the guy was using hacked credit cards to buy me RP. 
Long story short , i know it's my fault for dealing with such individuals , the guy blocked me on facebook and i have no way of finding his contact information . So i want to know what can i do knowing that in my country i can't pay the charges , i would if i could but sadly i can't and if there is anyone hoping to help me pay back the miniscule amout i've been charged please may he or she contact me i would be grateful for life and will pay you back in anyway i could. 
here's my email if you would like to see the email riot sent me and help 
Email: -snip, removing for security-
And thank you for your time 
Please troll elsewhere

replies.body: This is a really unfortunate circumstance.  :(  Making deals with strangers like this is super risky and one of the biggest reasons we don't support it, but I'm not sure what we could do about this case.  I'm really sorry that this situation ended up happening to you, and hope everything will work out.  Your best bet is to continue speaking with your Specialist to find some options.
Thank you for your support , i'll try talking to riot to see what i can do about it.
